page.title: 11FARMING,Holwell, Neopardy.
page.content: In{Neopardy}there is a farm called {Holwell Barton.}It is about 300 years old. Four people live in the house and they do bed and breakfast.The house is made of cob.They have got a lot of machinery. They have got:- tractors, a bailer, a mower, a cultivator, a hay turner, a roller, an elevator and some trailers. The farm has been in the family for 34 years. They used to make cider because they have got an orchard. They grow corn, hay and grass for silage. They have got a Massey Fergusson 590 turbo and a M.F. 165. They have also got an international loader. They have got 600 sheep and 1 dog. They have got about 12 sheds altogether. When they are lambing they clean the sheds out twice a week and they clean the bullocks shed out once a year. They only have bullocks on the farm for a short time.
